m_szDocTitle: Schumacher Battery Companion Fully Automatic 1.5A Trickle Charger
m_szDocSumamry: Published: Wed, February 03, 2016 Science | By Carlton Santiago Schumacher Battery Companion Fully Automatic 1.5A Trickle Charger Keep your 6 and 12V batteries fully charged with the . This special battery charger is ideal for charging small batteries and for maintaining batteries kept in storage. To make it easy, it has an LED indicating “Charging”, “Charged” and “Trouble”, and automatically switches from full charge to flat - mode monitoring. Make the  your companion.
